Birmingham.North Birmingham: North Birmingham is a community of Birmingham in Jefferson County, Alabama United States. Currently the North Birmingham community is further subdivided into seven neighborhoods: Acipco-Finley, Collegeville, Fairmont, Harriman Park, Hooper City, North Birmingham and  The community consists of the area north of Downtown Birmingham between Village Creek on the south, the Louisville and Nashville Railroad to the east, Pratt to the west and the jurisdictional boundary to the north. Originally incorporated as the city of North Birmingham in 1902, it was annexed into the City of Birmingham in 1910.
